INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 1030
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,2,-1,-1).
formula: G.f.: -(-2+x+2*x^2)/(-1+x+x^2)/(-1+x^2).Recurrence: {a(1)=1, a(2)=3, a(0)=2, -a(n)-2*a(n+1)+1+a(n+3)}.Sum(1/5*(1+2*_alpha)*_alpha^(-1-n), _alpha=RootOf(-1+_Z+_Z^2))+Sum(1/2*_alpha^(-n), _alpha=RootOf(-1+_Z^2)).a(n) = Fibonacci(n+1)+(1+(-1)^n)/2. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 23 2003a(n) = sum{k=0..n, C(k, n-k)+(-1)^(n-k)}. - _Paul Barry_, Jul 21 2003
mathematica: LinearRecurrence[{1,2,-1,-1},{2,1,3,3},50] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 01 2014 *)CoefficientList[Series[-(- 2 + x + 2 x^2)/(- 1 + x + x^2)/(-1 + x^2), {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 07 2014 *)
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Jun 05 2000
